about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey in Archesis, a unique 2D metroidvania game where you can freeze time to save a fallen kingdom! Immerse yourself in an atmospheric post-apocalyptic world, filled with exhilarating encounters, challenging obstacles, and dark mysteries. Master the power of time manipulation, as time moves only when you move, and unleash your full potential to overcome your foes.

Game Features

  • Unique time manipulation mechanics: Control time itself, as time only moves when you move, making for intense, strategic gameplay.
  • Compact metroidvania experience: Navigate through a multifaceted environment that constantly evolves as you progress, keeping the experience fresh and engaging.
  • Master your abilities: Unlock new weapons and abilities to help you overcome the challenges that lie ahead.
  • Atmospheric and stylized visuals: Immerse yourself in a dark, post-apocalyptic world brought to life with a stylized aesthetic.
  • Engaging single-player experience: Dive into a rich, captivating narrative that will keep you hooked throughout your adventure.
  • Face off against challenging foes: Confront a variety of enemies and epic bosses, each with their unique patterns and attacks.
  • Bullet hell inspired gameplay: Skillfully navigate through intense bullet hell encounters, testing your reflexes and strategic thinking.
  • Varied completion paths: Enjoy the freedom to choose from multiple routes and approaches, ensuring a diverse and replayable adventure.
